comment.note: Veterans play a games of wheelchair basketball against media outlets July 13 for the 29th National Veterans Wheelchair Games held in Spokane, Wa . More than 500 veterans meet at the convention center to take part in the 2009 National Veterans Wheelchair Games July 13 through 19. (U.S. Air Force photo/Staff Sgt. Desiree N. Palacios)
